Review Title: Wonderful Stay at Hotel Hayden and NYC Experience.
Negative Reviews: There wasn't anything that stood out to us that we didn't like. This hotel was exactly what we needed during NYE.
Positive Reviews:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Hotel Hayden, situated in the vibrant NOMAD area of NYC, and I wanted to share my delightful experience. Being a native New Yorker myself, this trip was more about showing my girlfriend the less touristy side of the city, and our choice to stay at Hotel Hayden proved to be perfect for this purpose.

Location and Accessibility:
The hotel's location is ideal for anyone looking to explore the heart of New York City. It's conveniently within walking distance to Herald Square, ESB, MSG, Times Square, 5th Avenue, and Central Park. We appreciated the ease of parking our car at the Icon lot just around the corner, where the hotel's parking validation offered a more affordable rate. There's also a wine store and two pharmacies less than 5 minutes away.

Easter Egg: As you walk out of the hotel, and make a right to 6th Ave, when you get to the corner, look up and to the left! 

Dining Options Galore:
One of the highlights of Hotel Hayden’s location is being surrounded by an array of dining options. From fast food to local bars and restaurants, we were spoilt for choice. We enjoyed exploring places like The Grey Dog, The Keg Room, The Harold, and Friedman's - all easily accessible on foot. Although the hotel offers breakfast, we chose to delve into the local culinary scene instead.

Exceptional Service:
The warmth and friendliness of the Hotel Hayden staff added to the charm of our stay. Their courteous and welcoming approach every time we interacted was notable and contributed to the overall positive experience. The service was undoubtedly A+!

Hotel Hayden not only provided us with a comfortable stay but also positioned us perfectly to experience New York City in its true essence. It was a fantastic trip to ring in the New Year, and your hotel played a significant part in making it special.

Thank you for the wonderful hospitality. We look forward to visiting again.
